column4: Is there a reason why my 11.10 amd64 system does not get the 12.04 in update-manager?
Update Mgr. won't list that until 12.04.1 is released; sometime in June, I believe.
do you have a pointer to a bug or a document?
It's not a bug, so the answer to your first is no; the second I have heard, many times, here..
